page.title: 03A DAY AT PARK ROAD SCHOOL
page.content: TODAY IS MONDAY. MR. JACKSON, THE CARETAKER, CAME INTO SCHOOL AT 7.30 AND HE FOUND {RUDE}WRITING ON THE WALLS. IT TOOK HIM 1/2 HOUR TO GET IT OFF BY SPRAYING ALL THE WALLS. AFTER UNLOCKING THE GATES, HE PUT HIS BIKE AWAY AND UNLOCKED ALL THE CLASSROOM DOORS. THE TEACHERS ARE IN SCHOOL FROM 8 A.M.,GETTING THEIR ROOMS READY.BY 8.30, I AM ON MY WAY TO SCHOOL WITH MY FRIENDS. AT SCHOOL,THE HEADMISTRESS AND MRS CHAPMAN, THE SECRETARY ARE ALREADY THERE. ABOUT 8.45, WE ALL BUSTLE INTO ASSEMBLY. WE SANG NO.32, I THINK. THEN MISS BROWN TOLD US A STORY. OUR FIRST LESSON WAS SENTENCES FOR SPELLINGS AND I MANAGED TO CLEAR A S.R.A. CARD BEFORE PLAY. AFTER PLAY, I DID TWO S.M.P.CARDS UNTIL 11.30. MISS MULLIGAN, OUR TEACHER,TOLD US TO DO
